subsection.name: 6.3 Many-to-Many Relationships
subsection.p: Many-to-many relationships can be modeled in two different ways:

ul.li: By modeling a join table as an ObjEntity. This is the most trivial case but it makes traversing many-to-many relationships relatively inconvenient.
Making join table transparent to the object model. This is achieved by using flattened relationships discussed further in this chapter.
